indenticator.color.dark.description: Color of the indent marker for dark themes

indenticator.color.light.description: Color of the indent marker for light themes

indenticator.width.description: Width of the indent marker in pixels

indenticator.style.description: Line style of the indent marker

indenticator.showCurrentDepthInStatusBar.description: Wether to display the current indent depth on the statusbar

indenticator.showHover.description: Wether to display the hover near the indent line, or minimum number of lines in current indent block to activate the hover.

indenticator.hover.peekBack.description: Lines before the current indent to be shown on hover

indenticator.hover.peekForward.description: Lines after the current indent to be shown on hover

indenticator.hover.trimLinesShorterThan.description: Remove lines from the hover at the beginning and end that have less characters than this

indenticator.hover.peekBlockPlaceholder.description: Block placeholder to be written between peeked lines

indenticator.languageSpecific.description: A construct with language identifiers as properties containing a subset of indenticator options to be applied to that language
